name: Mutatons
description:
Mutatons is logic puzzle game with area control elements. Gameplay base on controlling unruly creatures. In the middle of voyage, their starship had malfunction, which led to landing on unknown planet. Discover remnants of high-tech civilization, maybe they will help you with escaping. Explore labs and take control over stearing panels. Watch out for obstacles on paths, with help of mutation you can defeat them.

Programmers:

  • Krzysztof Michniewski
  • Mateusz Reczulski
  • Krzysztof Szcześniewski
  • Dominik Łukoszyk

Graphic designer:

  • Marek Kulicki
  • Aleksandra Grochowska
